Hi all,
I would need to search for text, entered in input text field, in 2 richtext columns of a table; I have tried everything but can't get results on both columns. The search query is this:
{% set query = query ~ "&question__icontains="~request.query_dict.ricerca_libera|urlencode  ~ "&answer__icontains="~request.query_dict.ricerca_libera|urlencode %}
where "request.query_dict.ricerca_libera|urlencode" is the input field where the user types in the text to be searched for
For now I solved it by inserting a third column in the table with both data: question and answer
Thanks
